```{.r .cell-code}
Blog_post <- function(title){
  data <- list(title = title,
               author = "Mark Edney",
               date = Sys.Date(),
               categories = list("How-to", "R", "Rmarkdown"),
               draft = FALSE,
               description = "''",
               image = "''",
               archives = format(date, "%Y/%m"),
               toc = FALSE,
               fold = "show",
               tools = TRUE,
               link =  FALSE)
  
  Template <- '---
  title: {{title}}
  author: {{author}}
  date: {{date}}
  categories: [{{categories}}]
  draft: {{draft}}
  description: {{description}}
  image: {{image}}
  archives:
    - {{archives}}
  toc: {{toc}}
  
  format:
    html: 
      code-fold: {{fold}}
      code-tools: {{tools}}
---
'
  
  dir.create(paste0("./posts/",date, "-", title))
  writeLines(whisker.render(Template, data), paste0("./posts/",date, "-", title, "/index.qmd"))
}
```
